SEARCH
Module org.example.scdpro2
Package org.example.scdpro2.ui.controllers

Class MainController

java.lang.Object
org.example.scdpro2.ui.controllers.MainController
public class MainController extends Object
The MainController class serves as the primary controller for managing interactions between the UI and business logic in the diagram management application. It handles the creation, saving, loading, and manipulation of projects and diagrams.

  • Method Details

    • setMainView

      public void setMainView(MainView mainView)
      Sets the MainView for this controller.
      Parameters:
      mainView - the main view associated with this controller.

    • createNewProject

      public void createNewProject()
      Creates a new project with a default name and logs its creation.

    • getDiagramService

      public DiagramService getDiagramService()
      Retrieves the DiagramService instance used by this controller.
      Returns:
      the DiagramService instance.

    • saveClassProjectToFile

      public void saveClassProjectToFile(File file)
      Saves the current class project to the specified file. The method serializes the project's state, including diagrams and relationships, and writes it to the file.
      Parameters:
      file - the file to which the project will be saved.

    • savePackageProjectToFile

      public void savePackageProjectToFile(File file)
      Saves the current package project to the specified file. The method serializes package diagrams and their relationships, ensuring all UI-related data is persisted.
      Parameters:
      file - the file to which the project will be saved.

    • loadPackageProjectFromFile

      public void loadPackageProjectFromFile(File file)
      Loads a package project from the specified file and updates the UI accordingly.
      Parameters:
      file - the file from which the project will be loaded.

    • loadClassProjectFromFile

      public void loadClassProjectFromFile(File file)
      Loads a class project from the specified file and updates the UI with the restored data.
      Parameters:
      file - the file from which the project will be loaded.

    • saveProject

      public void saveProject()
      Saves the current project to a user-selected file. The method distinguishes between class and package projects based on the active diagram pane.

    • loadProject

      public void loadProject()
      Loads a project from a user-selected file. The method distinguishes between class and package projects based on the active diagram pane.

    • createNewProject

      public void createNewProject(String projectName)
      Creates a new project with the specified name. If the main view is set, updates the class list view.
      Parameters:
      projectName - the name of the new project.

    • generateCode

      public String generateCode()
      Generates code from the current project using the CodeGenerationService.
      Returns:
      the generated code as a String, or null if no diagrams are available.

    • getAvailableClassNames

      public List<String> getAvailableClassNames()

    • addClassBox

      public void addClassBox(ClassDiagramPane diagramPane)
      Adds a new class box to the class diagram pane and the underlying project structure.
      Parameters:
      diagramPane - the pane to which the class box will be added.

    • addInterfaceBox

      public void addInterfaceBox(ClassDiagramPane diagramPane)
      Adds a new interface box to the class diagram pane and the underlying project structure.
      Parameters:
      diagramPane - the pane to which the interface box will be added.

    • deleteClassBox

      public void deleteClassBox(ClassDiagramPane pane, ClassBox classBox)
      Deletes a specified class box along with all associated relationships from the class diagram pane and project structure.
      Parameters:
      pane - the diagram pane from which the class box will be removed.
      classBox - the class box to be deleted.

    • createRelationship

      public void createRelationship(ClassDiagramPane pane, ClassBox source, String sourceSide, ClassBox target, String targetSide, RelationshipLine.RelationshipType type)
      Creates a relationship between two class boxes and adds it to both the UI and the business layer.
      Parameters:
      pane - the diagram pane where the relationship will be visualized.
      source - the source class box.
      sourceSide - the side of the source class box where the relationship originates.
      target - the target class box.
      targetSide - the side of the target class box where the relationship terminates.
      type - the type of relationship being created.

    • countRelationshipsBetween

      public int countRelationshipsBetween(ClassBox source, ClassBox target)
      Counts the number of relationships between two specified class boxes.
      Parameters:
      source - the source class box.
      target - the target class box.
      Returns:
      the number of relationships between the source and target.

    • getCurrentProject

      public Project getCurrentProject()
      Retrieves the current project from the project service.
      Returns:
      the current project or null if no project is initialized.

    • addClassDiagram

      public void addClassDiagram()
      Updates the main view to reflect changes in the class list, typically after adding a class diagram.

    • addPackageDiagram

      public void addPackageDiagram()
      Updates the main view to reflect changes in the package list, typically after adding a package diagram.

    • addPackageBox

      public void addPackageBox(PackageDiagramPane diagramPane)
      Adds a new package box to the package diagram pane and updates the business layer with the package component.
      Parameters:
      diagramPane - the pane to which the package box will be added.

    • addPackageClassBox

      public PackageClassBox addPackageClassBox(PackageDiagramPane diagramPane, PackageBox packageBox, PackageComponent packageComponent)
      Adds a new class to an existing package box in the package diagram pane.
      Parameters:
      diagramPane - the pane to which the package class box will be added.
      packageBox - the package box where the class will be added.
      packageComponent - the package component associated with the class.
      Returns:
      the created package class box.

    • addPackageClassBox

      public PackageClassBox addPackageClassBox(PackageDiagramPane diagramPane, PackageBox packageBox, PackageComponent packageComponent, PackageClassComponent pcc)
      Adds a new class to an existing package box using an existing package class component.
      Parameters:
      diagramPane - the pane to which the package class box will be added.
      packageBox - the package box where the class will be added.
      packageComponent - the package component associated with the class.
      pcc - the package class component to be added.
      Returns:
      the created package class box.

    • getmainview

      public MainView getmainview()
      Retrieves the main view of the application.
      Returns:
      the main view instance.

    • addPackageRelationship

      public void addPackageRelationship(PackageRelationship relationship)
      Adds a new relationship between two packages to the business layer and updates the mapping.
      Parameters:
      relationship - the package relationship to be added.
